dialogStrings:
“It's 200 gil , you wanna spend the night?”
{CHOICE}Yes
{CHOICE}No

“You heard about
the gnarly hill in this town?
They tell me it's off limits!”

“What luck!
We came all this way…crap!”

“We came from Costa del Sol to snowboard,
but we're just about to leave!”

“Whew, what is it?
